attributes.additional_details:
As a comedian I have to travel across the country for very little (if any) pay. And I'm not alone.

The amount of performers who struggle to develop their act or skills due to the cost of travel is massive.

There's a student pass & a pass for 18-25 year olds but nothing for performers who (often) have had to take up low paying jobs to focus on their skill / craft/ act.

We'd love to discuss a way that travel all over the uk could be more affordable for comedians & other working performers.

If you enjoy love live shows (or are a comedian / performer) please sign to help struggling artists.
